rukus.text: 37|114|tatha hamane upakaar kiya moosa aur haaroon par.
37|115|tatha mukt kiya donon ko aur unakee jaati ko, ghor vyagrata se.
37|116|tatha hamane sahaayata kee unakee, to vahee prabhaavashaalee ho gaye.
37|117|tatha hamane pradaan kee donon ko prakaashamay pustak (tauraat).
37|118|aur hamane darshaee donon ko seedhee dagar.
37|119|tatha shesh rakhee donon kee shubh charcha, pichhalon mein.
37|120|salaam hai moosa tatha haaroon par.
37|121|ham isee prakaar pratiphal pradaan karate hain, sadaachaariyon ko.
37|122|vastutah, ve donon hamaare eemaan vaale bhakton mein the.
37|123|tatha nishchay ilyaas, nabiyon mein se tha.
37|124|jab kaha usane apanee jaati seh kya tum darate nahin ho
37|125|kya tum baal ( naamak moorti) ko pukaarate ho? tatha tyaag rahe ho sarvottam utpattikarta ko
37|126|allaah hee tumhaara paalanahaar hai tatha tumhaare pratham poorvajon ka paalanahaar hai.
37|127|antatah, unhonne jhuthala diya use. to nishchay vahee (narak mein) upasthit honge.
37|128|kintu, allaah ke shudhd bhakt.
37|129|tatha shesh rakhee hamane usakee shubh charcha pichhalon mein.
37|130|salaam hai ilyaaseen[1] par.
37|131|vaastav mein, ham isee prakaar pratiphal pradaan karate hain, sadaachaariyon ko.
37|132|vastutah, vah hamaare eemaan vaale bhakton mein se tha.
37|133|tatha nishchay loot nabiyon mein se tha.
37|134|jab hamane mukt kiya use tatha usake sabaparijanon ko.
37|135|ek budhiya[1] ke siva, jo peechhe rah jaane vaalon mein thee.
37|136|phir hamane anyon ko tahas-nahas kar diya.
37|137|tatha tum[1] guzarate ho un (kee nirjeev bastiyon) par, praatah ke samay.
37|138|tatha raatri mein. to kya tum samajhate nahin ho
